item.title: Ep 15 - Metamorphosis
item.blip:puredescription: Master Brood and Val are stuck in an elevator while the city is faced with the return of Chromos. Confused about the recent events surrounding the team, Val opens up to Master brood about her past in order to understand how they can proceed to work with the rest of the Team.

item.title: Ep 14 - Anyone can be a Hero
item.blip:puredescription: After returning from fighting the fires in Chinatown, both Omni and him learn that Little Epic is missing. Omni attempts to search for clues about his whereabouts from Captain Epic’s memory, only to learn about how the Captain first met Little Epic many years ago.

item.title: Ep 16 - The war has begun
item.blip:puredescription: With each member of the team separated and on their own, a special unknown elite force confronts them and the result is shocking. After witnessing Omni getting attacked, Roy searches for the rest of Team Epic to help, only to learn that they all have been detained. Chromos takes this opportunity to begin his campaign to begin the war against all superheroes.

item.title: Ep 13 - Guilty or Not Guilty
item.blip:puredescription: Meanwhile, upon hearing of HiJaq’s death, Chromos prepares to come out of retirement and reclaim his city. Captain Epic and Kimberly must decide what to do about the consequences of her unknown actions. They must show the public that superheroes are not above the law.

item.title: Ep 9 - Chaos on the Homefront
item.blip:puredescription: The team is having hard time getting along as they all live in Kimberly’s apartment together. The two ex-equity cadets, HiJaq and Exile are starving in the streets as they come to their final conflict; to continue their search for Chromos and their parents, or return to the Academy.

item.title: Ep 7 - Careful what you ask for
item.blip:puredescription: Captain Epic approaches Bernard Embers for clues on the death of the Canadian Shield. Bernard indicates that some big time villains held up in a safe house in town may lead him to more information. The Team decides to go take care of them; with knowing that a mystery man is manipulating the situation.

item.title: Ep 6 -The Search for Answers
item.blip:puredescription: Uncertain of what their next step should be, the team decides to split up to search for clues into the death of the Canadian Shield. Some of them return to the scene of the Canadian Shield’s last battle, while Captain Epic and Little Epic respond to emergencies around the city.

item.title: Ep 5 - Illusion or Reality
item.blip:puredescription: The team is awakened early in the morning by a very distressed Omniscient. After having the same nightmare night after night, Omni enters the minds of the rest of the team to show them what he has seen; The death of the Canadian Shield. It does not look, however, like it was an accident.

item.title: Ep 1 - A Gathering of Supers
item.blip:puredescription: After the death of Canada’s greatest Superhero ‘The Canadian Shield’, heroes from near and far make their way to Toronto to pay their respects. Among these heroes is Captain Epic, an old ally of the Shield and a hero in his own right. During the course of the funeral, Captain Epic and his side-kick Little Epic rekindle old friendships and generate new ones.

item.title: Ep 2 - Undercover Hero
item.blip:puredescription: After receiving a strange clue about some villains in town, Captain Epic recruits his old friends to help him find the villains. Captain Epic goes undercover at a local high school to investigate. The rest of the superheroes search the area to find more clues about these unknown villains in the area.

item.title: Ep 3 - Smells Like a Fight
item.blip:puredescription: The villains ambush some of the superheroes at Roy’s house as they follow the clues for the unknown hacker. Captain Epic shows up to save Roy’s family and the superheroes. During an epic battle between Captain Epic and Exile, the villain Hijaq performs her own search for the clues to the identity of the super villain Chromos.

item.title: Ep 4 - A Name to Call Our Own
item.blip:puredescription: Hijaq and Exile are confronted by Chromos warning them to leave town and to stop searching for him. The superheroes have a gracious dinner by Roy’s mothers to thank them for saving their lives. They decide to stay around in Toronto and to form a team to protect the city; called Team Epic!!
